overview:
Jeong Min Lim (a.k.a Jeffrey Lim) is co-founder and CEO of RocketOz Inc., a Seoul-based game studion for social platforms like facebook. Before founding RocketOz, He was a Seoul-based associate of Softbank Ventures, a reputed venture capital firm of Japan.

He served as Director of Technical Sales in APAC at Bitfone Corporation, later acquired by Hewlett Packard. Before Bitfone, he was a senior developer at TenFold Corporation in San Francisco.

Jeffrey holds M.S degree in Management Science and Engineering from Stanford University, and M.S degree in Industrial Engineering from U.C.Berkeley. He earned his B.S degree in Industrial Engineering from Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology. Jeffrey, born in 1975, lives in Seoul with his wife.
